name.baseName: Substation Construction and Operation;110kV Indoor Substation;A2-6 Design Plan
变电站的建设和运营;110kV户内变电站;A2-6设计方案

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The whole life cycle carbon footprint model was used to quantify the carbon emissions from the operation and construction phases of the 110kV substation scheme. The operational carbon emissions include the carbon emissions from the maintenance process, and the construction carbon emissions include the production of building materials and the production of equipment.
采用全生命周期碳足迹模型对110kV变电站方案中的运行阶段和建设阶段碳排放量进行量化。其中运行过程碳排放包括了维护过程的碳排放，建设碳排放包括了建材的生产以及设备的生产。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The article did not specify the starting time of the dataset, and the time of publication of the literature was selected as the valid starting time, with a full life cycle of 25 years, with 2 years as the valid time period
文章未明确说明数据集的起始时间，选取文献发表时间作为有效起始时间，全生命周期为25年，以2年为有效时间段

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The geographic location of the substation is not specified in the text, and the geographic location of this author's company was selected
文中未明确说明该变电站所处的地理位置，选取该作者所在公司的地理位置

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Operation phase: 1. Energy consumption of substation loads: energy consumption caused by normal operation and power supply of equipment in the substation, generally AC loads, DC loads, and USP loads. 2. Self-consumption of energy by electrical equipment: power loss generated by electrical equipment with coils and impedance components in the normal operation of the substation, which is non-designed and uncontrollable. 3. Sulfur Hexafluoride (SF6) emissions: widely used as high-voltage insulation and arc extinguishing media in the electric power industry. 4. Emission of sulfur hexafluoride: it is widely used in the electric power industry as a high-voltage insulation and arc extinguishing medium, and in recent years, it has been more and more widely used in medium-voltage switchgear and ring network cabinets. 4. Carbon emission from operation and maintenance: in a city with a population of about 3 million people, the frequency of operation and maintenance of a traditional substation is four times a month, and the distance between the substation and the operation and maintenance center is 30 kilometers on average. construction phase: 1. mineral oil for transformers: in a conventional A2-6 scheme, there are two 50 MVA main transformers, each of which requires mineral oil. The amount of transformer oil replenished during operation is very small compared with the amount filled during construction, so its impact can be ignored. 2. equipment raw materials. 3. construction raw materials: the steel required for the construction of the assembled substation in the conventional A2-6 scheme is about 460 t, and the cement is 968 t.

运行阶段：1.变电站站用负荷耗能：变电站内设备正常运行供电导致的能 耗，一般为交流负荷、直流负荷、USP负荷。2.电气设备自耗能：变电站中带有线圈的电气设备及有阻抗的元 件在正常工作中产生的电能损耗，属于非设计性 的不可控损耗。3.六氟化硫的排放：在电力行业中被广泛用作高压绝缘和灭弧介质，近年来在中 压开关柜、环网柜中也得到越来越广泛的应用。4.运维过程碳排放：一个人口规模 300 万左右的城市中，传统变电站运维频率为每 月 4 次，变电站距运维中心的距离平均为 30 km。建设阶段：1.变压器矿物油:常规 A2-6 方案中有 2 台 50 MVA 的主变，每台需 矿物油约 22 t，每吨在使用过程中产生碳排放约 1.23 t，共产生碳排放约 54 t。变压器油在运行过 程中补充的量和建设时灌装的量相比很小，可忽略其带来的影响。2.设备原材料。3.建筑原材料：常规 A2-6 方案装配式变 电站建设所需钢材约为 460 t，水泥为 968 t
technology.technologicalApplicability: The 110kV Indoor Substation, designed following the A2-6 plan, is engineered for the conversion and distribution of electrical power within the grid network. It serves a critical role in managing the electricity supply for a city of approximately 3 million people. The substation is specifically intended for indoor use, implying it is suitable for areas that require a minimized physical footprint or protected installation due to environmental or logistical considerations.
110kV户内变电站依据A2-6设计方案，用于电网中电能的变换与分配。该变电站对于管理大约300万人口城市的电力供应起着关键作用。该变电站专为室内使用设计，此举意在适用于因环境或物流考虑需要最小化物理占用面积或受保护安装的地区。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Selection of appropriate carbon emission factors and other data from the IPCC 2006 Guidelines for National Greenhouse Gas Inventories and related papers. The amount of raw materials such as building materials is based on the A2-6 program.
从《IPCC 2006 国家温室气体清单指南》与相关论文中选择合适的碳排放因子等数据。建材等原料用量依据A2-6方案得出

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 王卓. 基于全生命周期的110kV变电站降碳方案研究. 电工电气 66–69 (2022).
王卓. 基于全生命周期的110kV变电站降碳方案研究. 电工电气 66–69 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) data for the 110kV Indoor Substation under the A2-6 Design Plan, attention should be paid to the geographical representativeness as the data is based on the geographical location of the author's company rather than the actual location of the substation. The starting time of the dataset coincides with the literature publication date, and the life cycle is considered to be 25 years, with analyses recommended in 2-year increments. Users should note the inclusion of both construction and operation phase emissions, with an emphasis on operation-related consumptions (station service load energy consumption, self-consumption of energy by electrical equipment) and maintenance procedures. The impact of the replenishment of transformer oil during operation is deemed negligible compared to its initial filling during construction. Emission factors should be adapted from the IPCC 2006 Guidelines or related scholarly work relevant to the regional context of the project.

在使用110kV户内变电站A2-6设计方案的生命周期评估（LCA）数据时，应注意地理代表性问题，因为数据基于作者所在公司的地理位置，而非变电站实际位置。数据集的起始时间与文献发表时间一致，生命周期被认为是25年，并推荐每2年进行一次分析。用户应注意包括建筑和运营阶段排放的数据，强调与变电站运营相关的能耗（站用负荷能耗、电气设备自耗能）和维护程序。变电站运行过程中变压器油的补充影响相比建设初期注入量被认为是可以忽略的。排放因子应根据《IPCC 2006国家温室气体清单指南》或与项目区域背景相关的学术工作调整。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The stream corresponding to the substation cannot be found in da.tiangong.world.
Check the product flow of mineral oil in da.tiangong.world. There are two 50 MVA main transformers in the conventional A2-6 solution, each requiring about 22 tons of mineral oil.
常规 A2-6 方案中有 2 台 50 MVA的主变，每台需矿物油约22 t。
A2-6 Plan 2 main transformers contain 28 t of copper in raw materials; the total station GIS raw materials contain 3.3 t of copper; the entire station switch cabinet contains 24.2 t of copper
A2-6 方案 2 台主变原材料中铜 28 t；全站 GIS 原材料中铜 3.3 t；全站开关柜铜 24.2 t

50 t of other steel materials are used as raw materials for the two main transformers of the conventional A2-6 scheme; 2.2 t of steel are used as raw materials for GIS of the whole station; 10.8 t of steel are used for the switch cabinet of the whole station.
常规A2-6方案2台主变原材料中其他钢材50 t；全站GIS 原材料中钢 2.2 t；全站开关柜用钢10.8 t

A2-6 Plan 2 Main transformer raw materials include 63 tons of silicon steel sheets. The silicon steel sheets are essentially extremely low carbon steel plates with a mass fraction of silicon of 0.5% to 5%. They are replaced by existing flows.
A2-6 方案 2 台主变原材料中硅钢片 63 t，硅钢片实质上是硅的质量分数为0．5％～5％的极低碳钢板，以已有的流代替
Site-wide GIS raw material Chinalco 16.6 t
全站 GIS 原材料中铝 16.6 t
The steel required for the construction of the conventional A2-6 scheme prefabricated substation is approximately 460 t
常规 A2-6 方案装配式变 电站建设所需钢材约为 460 t
Recorded on a one-year basis, carbon emissions during the operation phase. According to experts, this is carbon dioxide (fossil).
按一年记，运行阶段碳排放。根据专家研判，此处为二氧化碳（化石源）
Recorded on a one-year basis, carbon emissions during the construction phase. According to experts, this is carbon dioxide (fossi).
按一年记，建设阶段碳排放。根据专家研判，此处为二氧化碳（化石源）
